TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DisplayColumnAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定作为外键列显示在被引用表中的列。

span.span: Specifies the column that is displayed in the referred table as a foreign-key column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当表中的某列包含外键时，动态数据将从所引用的表中推断该列的显示值。When a column in a table contains a foreign key, Dynamic Data infers the display value for that column from the referenced table. 默认情况下，将使用类型为 string (或 text) 的被引用表的第一列。By default, the first column of the referenced table whose type is string (or text) is used. 使用特性可以更改此默认行为，并指定要用作外键字段的列的其他父表列。The attribute enables you to change this default behavior and to specify a different parent table column to use as the column for the foreign key field. 应用此特性时，必须遵循以下使用限制：When you apply this attribute, you must adhere to the following usage constraints: - 特性只能应用于类。The attribute can only be applied to a class. - 派生类可以继承此特性。The attribute can be inherited by derived classes. - 特性只能应用一次。The attribute can be applied only one time. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 特性。The following example shows how to use the attribute. 该示例执行以下任务：The example performs the following tasks: - 实现 Address 和 Customer 表的元数据分部类，这些表是 CustomerAddress 表的父表。Implements metadata partial classes for the Address and Customer tables, which are parent tables for the CustomerAddress table. - 将特性应用于 `Address` 元数据分部类，以指定以下各项：Applies the attribute to the `Address` metadata partial class to specify the following: - 来自 (父表) 的 Address 表中的 City 列显示为 CustomerAddress 子表中的外键列。The City column from the Address table (the parent table) is displayed as the foreign-key column in the CustomerAddress child table. - 来自 (父表的 Address 表中的 "邮政编码" 列) 用于对 CustomerAddress 子表中的地址选择框进行排序。The PostalCode column from the Address table (the parent table) is used for sorting the Address selection box in the CustomerAddress child table. - 排序顺序设置为 "升序"。The sort order is set to ascending. 该示例将特性应用于 `Customer` metadata 分部类，以指定显示为 CustomerAddress 表的外键列的 LastName 列。The example applies the attribute to the `Customer` metadata partial class to specify that the LastName column in displayed as the foreign-key column for the CustomerAddress table. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute/CS/Address.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute/VB/Address.vb#1)] 若要编译该示例，需要以下各项：To compile the example, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更高版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关如何下载和安装 SQL Server 示例数据库的信息，请参阅 GitHub 上的 [Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例：数据库](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) 。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 请确保为运行的 SQL Server 版本安装了正确版本的示例数据库。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 动态数据驱动的网站。A dynamic data-driven Web site. 这使您可以为数据库创建数据上下文，并创建包含要自定义的数据字段的类。This enables you to create a data context for the database and to create the class that contains the data field to customize. 有关详细信息，请参阅 `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`。For more information, see `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义父列以在子表的页中显示为外键列。The following example shows how to define the parent column to display in a page for the child table as the foreign-key column. summary.span: 使用指定的显示列和排序列初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified display and sort columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，中指定的列 `sortColumn` 将按升序排序。By default, the column specified in `sortColumn` will be sorted in ascending order.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义父列以在子表的页中显示为外键列。The following example shows how to define the parent column to display in a page for the child table as the foreign-key column. 它设置用于排序的父表列，还设置排序顺序。It sets the parent table column for sorting and also sets the sort order.
